question: On a recent holiday, you lost a valuable item. Fortunately, you have travel insurance to cover the cost of anything lost.Write a letter to the manager of your insurance company. In your letter:-describe the item you lost-explain how you lost it-tell the insurance company what you would like them to do
text: I would like to write this letter to the insurance company to ponder the light on the thing which I had lost during the vacation. Moreover, give them the advice to do some possible research to find the item.

Furthermore, the object was an apple AirPods pro which I borrowed online and also with having apple care for them. It is white in colour with my name on the top. Additionally, a cute teddy bear cover was on to protect them from scratches.

However, when I went on travelling with my friends to Manali. We stayed at Maya Hotel in a presidential suite. Accidentally, I might be lost AirPods in the hotel room because I was putting them into the side table locker that was the time when I last saw my AirPods.

To add it on, It is fortunate for having travel insurance for them. I would suggest them to search AirPods in the hotel by doing some enquires. If it will not have been found, then I want a new case which looks as same as the previous one.
Thank you, I look forward to hearing from you.
